name: Post Haste: Onslaught
description: Post Haste: Onslaught is a game where you must kill to survive. It was made in 5 Days for the UGS discord Game Jam! You are slowly losing blood level and must fight waves of endless enemies to fill your blood. Find weapons, search for tomes and Bhop at Mach 5 to survive. Bhopping plays a huge part of surviving in this game so take your finger off of W and Bhop like its quake!
